item.title: Wordle
item.description: Wordle Wordle is a daily word game where players have six attempts to guess a five letter word. In this project the Wordle game was developed to be executed from the command line. Available languages: Italian English To Run To run the project: python3 main.py Usage An example of the usage of the game: If you want to see the GitHub project click on the icon below:
